trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Cancun
There were no other sightings in Cancun on or around July 15th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was working at home when i heard some thunders and knew a storm was coming from the sea. i went to the balcony and there were some big white clouds arriving from the south and south-east a storm was under them. so i decided to take my camera and went to the roof, this time willing to capture any ufo nearby, because of the two other experiences i had (one of them posted here earlier, case number: 18100, and the other one case number: 16319). so i took my camera and took 59 photos in 20 minutes . i returned to my apartment, the rain came some minutes later, and downloaded the pictures to my computer. and yes, there it was, a strange object in one of the photos. the camera i used was a lumix tmc-tz5 10mpx, the photo was taken within the following parameters: f\3.3 iso100, focal length:28mm, shutter: 1\800 , jpeg. i am posting the picture number 27 where this object is.
